root.name: Tir Na Nog
root.description: Plot:Tir na nog (irish for "Land of Youth") is the eponymous location for the game where the protagonist CÃº Chulainn has departed the land of the living and finds himself at an altar in this land wich is basicly the afterlife. His goal is to collect the four fragments of the Seal of Calum and get them to the altar
